info.brief_description: A recently-single man decides to re-enter the dating game with a younger boy.
info.description:
Take on the role of one of five different recently-single men looking to re-enter the dating scene. All five are interested in younger boys/men. Navigate their lives, control their decisions, and ultimately fix them up with a young man of their own. Will they be hookups or lead to something more? The choice is yours!

WARNINGS
May include underage content. This is purely a work of fiction not meant to imply actual events. In real life, I do not condone any of the content contained herein. Any resemblance to persons living or dead is purely coincidental.
